copy.title: Water Web
copy.welcome_text: This is Spider Silk Grotto, where we collect dewdrops to decorate blades of grass. Can you help collect the falling dewdrops?
copy.tutorial_finalscore_label: Now see if you can collect all the drops!
copy.host_level_tutorial_1: See if you can do it.
copy.host_bubble_1: See if you can do it
copy.host_bubble_4: Add a strand to guide the drop into the walnut bucket!
copy.tutorial_step1: This is Spider Silk Grotto. I'm going to show you how to collect the dewdrops!
copy.tutorial_step2: Dewdrops fall from the flowers and roll down the strands of the spider webs.
copy.tutorial_step3: You can add strands to guide the drops so they go into the walnut bucket at the bottom.
copy.tutorial_step4: Watch the flowers at the top! They'll shake when a dewdrop is about to fall.
copy.tutorial_step6: Dewdrops follow the web strands down. They will move to another strand if they run into one that goes across. Watch!
copy.tutorial_step8: See? We made a path for it to follow, and it went into the cup!
copy.tutorial_step9: Don't forget, you can take away any strands YOU make.
copy.tutorial_step11: Splashtastic! Donâ€™t forget, you can remove strands, too. You can have 6 strands at a time on the web.
copy.tutorial_step14: The spiders will weave some strands that you can't remove. Watch out for those!
copy.tutorial_step15: You can see how you're doing here. This shows how many dewdrops you need to catch to finish the level!
copy.tutorial_step16: Let's see if you can get 2 drops in.
copy.tutorial_step17: You'll lose chances if you miss dewdrops, so be careful. I'll be here if you need me!
copy.level_tip_easy: Hi, little sprinkle! What do you say we catch some dewdrops?
copy.level_tip_med: There are so many dewdrops to catch. Come on!
copy.level_tip_hard: These dewdrops will be hard to get, but I know you can do it!
copy.level_tip_royal: Get ready, because this will be tricky. One, two, three, GO!
copy.level_tip_all: Fairy friend! So happy to see you! Let's catch some dew!
copy.level_end_easy: You did such a great job! We'd love to see you again soon!
copy.level_end_med: You dance so lightly on the webs! Visit us again!
copy.level_end_hard: Wonderful web moving! We'd like to see you again!
copy.allmedium_story: You're one splashtastic dewdrop catcher! Those silly spiders won't be able to keep up with you!
copy.allhard_story: Those silly spiders will be sneakier than ever now. Let's go!
copy.allroyal_story: Splashtacular job! Now let's see if you can get these last dewdrops. They're the trickiest of all!
copy.instruction0: Dewdrops fall from the flowers and roll down the strands of web. Try to guide them to fall into the walnut bucket.
copy.instruction1: Guide dewdrops to the bucket. Click to add new strands to the web to change the drop's course.
copy.instruction2: You can have 6 of your own strands on the web at once. If you try to add another, your first strand will disappear!
copy.instruction3: If you see a dewdrop sitting on the web, guide the falling drop over it to earn a Bonus!
copy.instruction4: If all your drops fall off the web, the game is over.
copy.game_over_win_0: You won! I couldn't have done it without you. Come by to help again anytime!
copy.game_over_win_1: You made this job so much fun! Thanks for the help, and come back again, okay?
copy.game_over_win_2: Congratulations! Wow, you're a real starfish when it comes to collecting dewdrops!
copy.game_over_win_3: Congratulations! You're a splashtacular dewdrop catcher!
copy.game_over_win_4: You did great! I'm going to remember your web skills the next time I need to collect dewdrops!
copy.game_over_lose_0: Oh no! All the dewdrops fell off the web! That's okay, you can always try again.
copy.game_over_lose_1: Those silly spiders aren't easy to deal with, are they? Stop by and we can give it another try!
copy.game_over_lose_2: Oh, too bad! You can always come back -- I'd love to team up with you again!

copy.level_tip_30: Collect all 20 drops on this level and you'll win the game! Come on, we can do it!
